body.name: Billie Razors for Women Shave Kit – Women’s Razor + 4 x 5-Blade Razor Refills + Magnetic Holder – DreamPop
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 25% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 32 mins
features: WOMEN’S RAZOR KIT: A non-slip ergonomic handle, four 5-blade razor refills, and signature magnetic holder.
5 NICKEL-FREE BLADES: Super sharp and surrounded by aloe shave soap
EASY & COMFORTABLE: Non-slip ergonomic handle with a pivoting head
MAGNETIC HOLDER: Keeps your razor on the shower wall and out of the shower puddle.
DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED: Great for all skin types, even sensitive skin.
COMPLETE YOUR SET: Pairs perfectly with the Billie Whipped Shave Cream and Travel Case, for the ultimate shave experience.
body.description: Meet “The Internet’s Favorite Razor” – winner of countless awards and with over 20,000 5-star reviews, it’s designed to float over your skin for an ultra-close, ultra-smooth shave. It’s a premium, high-quality razor for a great price. The Billie Razor is made with 5 sharp blades encased in 360º of soothing aloe shave soap that helps your razor float over your skin like a comfy cloud. Say bye to stubble, irritation, bumps and ingrown hair! The ergonomic handle is made with a non-slip matte rubber back and comes in fun colors to brighten your bathroom. It also comes with a magnetic holder to keep your razor on the shower wall and out of the shower puddle. No more suction cups!

productInformation.value: #460 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #1 in Women's Cartridge Razors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I first heard of these a few years ago and then bought 2 for my girls for their vacation, and after they used theirs for the first time they called me raving about how great they are! So I decided I was due a little spoiling and I bought another for myself. I’d resided to using the packaged disposables for a few years which always felt cheap (bcuz they were) well let me tell you the comparison is like night and day!This new razor is weighted properly and feels good in my hand, literally glides along my skin. The blade feels so smooth and is so easy to maneuver around my leg and knees curves and bones, without even trying. How many times in my 65 years I’ve accidentally skinned the back or outside of my ankle with a razor, enough that I’m always wary when I’m near that spot. But not with this new one, it just floats gently around the area, it’s got to have something to do with its shape and design, it’s just so comfortable to use.It’s also worth mentioning how nice it is to have it hanging on its magnetic holder that sticks to the shower wall with a little dab of putty that’s on the back side … and that’s movable if you need to do so. If you’re on the fence about getting one, take the jump and get one for yourself, you’ll love it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars L O V E
reviews.reviewText: So I purchased the Billie razor because I am sick of spending money on disposables that I get two shaves from (maybe) and get dull and cut my legs. This Billie razor is amazing, I never realized how much I needed the handle it makes shaving so much easier due to the shape. Also the razor glides so nicely and I notice I don't have to shave daily like with the disposable razors. I will subscribe and have my refill delivered monthly. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great price for such a quality and useful shower tool
reviews.reviewText: I am very sensitive in my underarm area and this razor is gentle and efficient. I love that it came with a magnetic shower holder and so many extra razors! It was easy to place on my shower wall and I no longer need to store my razor in the cupboard until I need to use it. I have used my current razor, purchasing new razor attachments as needed for about 10 years! It finally fell apart during my last shower and I am super pleased to find the Billie razor as a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good razor, wasteful & ridiculous packaging
reviews.reviewText: I bought the starter pack and a set of 4 additional blades so: one handle, 8 blades & the tiny magnetic shower mount and this (pic attached) is the amount of packaging I had to wrestle them all out of & now wrangle into the recycling.The razor is very nice and gets a close, comfortable shave but there’s really no need to package it like a freakin iPhone, I mean really, get over yourself, Billie. The product speaks for itself, we don’t need any more packaging & waste to prove it’s worth the money, and this amount of cardboard doesn’t benefit the consumer, we’re pretty sick of dealing with it all frankly so maybe being more environmentally friendly, saving the company some money & saving your customers time is the way to go…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I will never ever shave with anything else. I have PCOS and a skin condition called hidradenitis suppurativa. I have always preferred to not shave at all because it wasn't worth the skin irritation after. This razor is a literal godsend. I paired it with an EOS shave cream and I had shaved my legs and pits that hadn't been shaved in like 6 months. I had zero irritation during or after shaving. I don't often leave reviews but this one needed the review. You won't be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the best razors ever!! For the price, with the extra razors included and the magnetic holder! Plus, super cute. I was using Harry’s razor brand for years until i bought this, and i won’t go back! One of the smoothest and closet shaves i’ve ever got, and TBH i don’t think i even need to use a shaving cream or soap!! First use, didn’t even cut myself, and it’s been years since that’s happened to me. BUY IT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Billie is the GOAT
reviews.reviewText: I've used a LOT of different razors, from all different brands, and this has been the best I've ever used. The aloe vera band is insane and makes shaving so smooth and FAST. I don't even have to use shaving cream anymore?? What??! The design is cute and these are super affordable, and WAY better than other brands with the similar reusable handle style (Joy, Flamingo, etc.). Definitely hang up the magnet asap because the aloe gel can seep/melt onto the surface of the shower if you just set it face down. I'm obsessed with this razor and don't want to use anything else!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice shave, blade falls off
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice shave but the blade falls off multiple times as shaving. I tried to change blade and it’s still an issue.
Love the magnetic holder! For this , make it so much easier to store it safely. Really comfortable to hold and use. Highly reccomend
It is as decent as most other reusable razors. So paying more for "Billie" and waiting a whole month for shipping, wasn't worth it. Perfectly adequate razor, but nothing special for the price.
